page.title: 04LIFE IN TREMEIRCHION SCHOOL2
page.content: At the beginning of spring we go to a pantomime at theatr Clwyd.We go in a coach from the school to Mold and we have lots of fun there.We go to the Suncentre at the beginning of the Urdd practising and we have so much fun there.After finishing the practice we go to the Rhyl eisteddfod where we compete against other schools.In the summer term we have sports.We are divided into teams and we run races against each other.This year we went to the outdoor pursuits centre in Pentre LLyn Cymer for a week.This year we are going to Chester zoo for a day.We are going on a sponsored walk and I plan to get lots of sponsors for it .
